dict.acceptation: <美>城郊住宅区的；两性关系的，男女性爱的；

sent.orig: Khruschev and Bulganin each had a bedroom near their hosts Mr. and Mrs. Eden's bedroom.
sent.trans: 赫鲁晓夫和布尔加宁各住一间，紧靠东道主艾登夫妇的卧室。

sent.orig: To make space in the bedroom, she put away her winter clothes in the upstairs bedroom.
sent.trans: 为了在卧室里腾出地方来，她把她的冬装全收起来放在楼上那间卧室里了。

sent.orig: My bedroom is in a tight proximity with my parent's bedroom.
sent.trans: 我的卧室紧挨着父母的卧室。

sent.orig: We have single, one bedroom to four bedroom, furnished or unfurnished.
sent.trans: 我们有单人套房、一房至四房的单位、连家具或不连家具的单位。

sent.orig: Yoko: Well yes, I was there. We were in the bedroom, in our bedroom in Ascot.
sent.trans: 记得，当时我也在。我们在卧室里，在亚斯科的卧室里。
